DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine effect scapular exercise pain related parameter include pain intensity , 24 hour pain intensity , pressure pain threshold , anxiety muscle tension patient scapulocostal syndrome .
DOC.brief_title: Effects Scapular Exercise Patients With Scapulocostal Syndrome
DOC.criteria: 1 . Male female 2 . Age 18 50 year old 3 . The participant experience spontaneous scapular pain longer 12 week ( chronic ) least one trigger point present scapular region ( serratus posterior superior , rhomboid group , levator scapula trapezius muscle ) . Trigger point diagnose presence focal tenderness taut band pain recognition ( Chatchawan et al. , 2005 ; Tough et al. , 2007 ) . 4 . The participant able follow instruction . 5 . Good communication cooperation . 1 . A history follow disease disorder : Rotator cuff disease Cervical radiculopathy Degenerative shoulder joint disease Adhesive capsulitis shoulder
